data.text: Teman nui Elifaze kpɔɛi zeɠeni, é ɠɛ ma:
«Nu ɠa zoo nɛi é woo ɲɛ gila bo è ma? È wola iɲɔteʋeʋɛ!
Wɛlɛ, ɗa ɠa è ɠɛa nu mɔinmɔin kalasu,
È ɓɔɛ wooiti ti ɠɛni naama nui wuzeɠezu nii é ɠɛni loozu,
Niizu ɗa ɠa è iɲɔ ge leʋea siɛgi zu maanɔɠɔi è ma la!
Ɗa-ɠidaaleʋei è bo ga GALA ma, naa laade é ʋa ɠɛ ga ɗa-ladalai ma ungi ɓaa?
Ɠisiɛ lɛɛ, sɔbalala nui ɓɛgele ɠa undaaʋiliga?
Ʋelegi gè ɠidaa bu la,
GALA daa viilɛi ɠa ɗa ti undaaʋili,
GALA ka ɗa zalaiti daaɠulu, ta ɠɛna zikɔa,
Daamiani balagi ɠa ɗa zalai ʋaa,
«Wooi ta zeelini mà dɔɔɠuzu,
segi zu, kpidii, siɛgi zu kisiɛiti supuai la,
Gè ɓalini ga duai,
Fiilɛi ta ma zii ʋuuni gàazuʋɛ,
Nui ta ɠɛni loni gàazu, gè la ɠɛni baaɠulaba ɠwɛɛ,
‹Nuɓusɛi ɠa lelebo nɛi ɓaa GALA gaazu?
Ni GALA ge la zooga é ʋa ʋoluzei tɔ ɓɔɠɔi ná-botiɠɛ nuiti ba,
toɠa zoo ɠale ʋoluzeizu nuɓusɛiti ba, ti ɓɛtɛai nɔ ga penɛi,
É zo sobui ma, é ʋa li kpɔkɔi ʋɔ, ti ɠɛa ga fufiligi,
Ti-yɛnvui ma ɠalui leʋea ga,
